General.Name: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of automatic production equipment in China. It offers conveying and measuring, mixing reaction, and filling and packaging products; double screws; chemical machinery and intelligent equipment; lithium battery production equipment; new energy equipment; weighing and batching, kiln line, graphite chemical, spray drying, and other ultrafine powder equipment; and organic silicon production equipment. The company also provides aerogels materials; silicon materials, such as vulcanized and liquid silicone rubber, and electronic industrial rubber; battery-grade lithium carbonate; lepidolite resources; water-based resin; silicone oil; raw rubber; and polymer compounds. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Foshan, China.

5.Name: Mr. Qiang  Cheng
5.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Production Director
